summary: Iteration 8 testing complete - All new features for notes/Google Drive link on Clients page and 'Mine' to 'My' toggle text change verified successfully. All 5 backend tests passed, all 8 frontend features verified working.
passed_tests: Backend: Organization created without google_drive_link (optional field)
Backend: GET /api/organizations returns notes and google_drive_link fields
Backend: Test client 'Test Client with Drive' exists with notes and drive link
Frontend: Pipeline page shows 'All' and 'My' toggle (not 'Mine')
Frontend: Reports page shows 'All' and 'My' toggle (not 'Mine')
Frontend: Create Client dialog has 'Notes' textarea field
Frontend: Create Client dialog has 'Google Drive Link' input field
Frontend: Client cards display notes when present (FileText icon)
Frontend: Client cards display Google Drive link when present (ExternalLink icon)
Frontend: Client detail page shows 'Open Google Drive Folder' link in read mode
Frontend: Client detail page shows 'Notes' section in read mode
Frontend: Client detail edit mode has 'Notes' textarea field
Frontend: Client detail edit mode has 'Google Drive Link' input field
seed_data_creation: Verified 'Test Client with Drive' exists with notes and google_drive_link
context_for_next_testing_agent: All iteration 8 features verified: 1) Pipeline and Reports pages show 'All' and 'My' toggle buttons (changed from 'Mine'). 2) Create Client dialog includes Notes textarea and Google Drive Link input fields. 3) Client cards in list view display notes (with FileText icon) and Google Drive link (with ExternalLink icon). 4) Client detail page shows notes section and 'Open Google Drive Folder' link in read mode. 5) Client detail edit mode includes editable Notes and Google Drive Link fields. Test client 'Test Client with Drive' available for verification.

verified_features.create_client_notes_field: Working - Notes textarea in Add Client dialog
verified_features.create_client_drive_link_field: Working - Google Drive Link input in Add Client dialog
verified_features.client_card_notes_display: Working - Notes shown with FileText icon on cards
verified_features.client_card_drive_link_display: Working - Google Drive link shown with ExternalLink icon on cards
verified_features.client_detail_drive_link_read: Working - 'Open Google Drive Folder' link in read mode
verified_features.client_detail_notes_read: Working - Notes section displayed in read mode
verified_features.client_detail_drive_link_edit: Working - Google Drive Link input in edit mode
verified_features.client_detail_notes_edit: Working - Notes textarea in edit mode
